name: Weedle

attacks.name: Poison Sting
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pok√©mon is now Poisoned.

flavorText: Often found in forests, eating leaves. It has a sharp, venomous stinger on its head.

strengths: Energy-efficient Poison Sting costs only 1 Grass Energy
Poison status deals persistent 10 damage between turns
Evolves through Kakuna into Beedrill, a strong Stage 2 Pokemon
Low retreat cost of 1 provides flexibility
Can disrupt opponents from the very first turn
weaknesses: Very low 40 HP makes it extremely fragile
Fire weakness is significant with popular Fire Pokemon in format
Poison effect relies on coin flip, making it unreliable
Only 10 damage output limits offensive pressure
No resistance to help with defensive matchups
synergies: Evolve quickly through Kakuna into Beedrill for powerful attacks
Use Poison status to chip away at high-HP Pokemon while evolving
PlusPower can boost Poison Sting to 20 damage for better trades
Defender helps Weedle survive one extra turn to apply poison
counters: Charmander - Fire weakness means quick knockouts
Ponyta - Fire type advantage is devastating
Vulpix - Fire weakness and better HP make this very difficult
